title: League Won't Open Properly
body: Whenever I try to open my Lol launcher, I am greeted with a message saying "PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working, Windows is checking for a solution to the problem." Followed up with "A problem caused the program to stop working correctly, Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available," which is hasn't done. I would really appreciate if someone could tell me how to fix this, it really does suck.

replies.body:
Anytime you see this kernel error pop up there's a good sign that your OS is blocking the League patcher from connecting to our patch servers. Your OS needs give certain programs permission to do certain things like downloading patches and such, and without those permissions, the program won't be able to load. 

Go through our [**Permission Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get those settings in place. Let me know if you have any questions!
Mine says the application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005) i have no idea and im sure this problem is similar to yours
